name: Pretty Visitors
description:
A group of drug addicts calling themselves "Children of Lucifer" decide to "Cleanse" the human kind by "Setting them free".

You play as Jacob and Jessica, a married couple who find themselves helpless in this satanic ritual and try to escape to save their lives

  • Controlls :
    • 'W','A','S','D' to Move around
    • 'Keypad Enter'/'Space' to Accept
    • 'Space' to Attack
    • '1','2' to Change Weapons

If you like the game, please consider reviewing it

If you happen to find any bugs, kindly let me know :)

Follow the Development of my future games @ My Twitter
